meanings.definition: Capable of being smelled or detected by sniffing.
meanings.sent1: The fresh flowers were very sniffable.
meanings.sent2: The cookies in the oven were quite sniffable.
meanings.sent3: The sniffable perfume made everyone sneeze.
meanings.sent4: The scent of the ocean was so sniffable, it felt like a hug.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the barbecue was incredibly sniffable.

meanings.definition: Having a scent that can be easily detected by the nose.
meanings.sent1: The sniffable candles filled the room with a pleasant smell.
meanings.sent2: The freshly baked bread was very sniffable.
meanings.sent3: The sniffable cheese made the mouse dance with joy.
meanings.sent4: The flowers in the garden were so sniffable, they seemed to sing.
meanings.sent5: The cookies were so sniffable, they disappeared in minutes.
